scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.ci: npm run build-podcast && npm run ci-check && npm run test
scripts.ci-check: npm run ci-lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.ci-lint: biome ci rai server cf tools
scripts.lint: biome check --apply rai server cf tools
scripts.test: npm run test-rai && npm run test-server && npm run test-cf
scripts.typecheck: concurrently "npm run typecheck-rai" "npm run typecheck-server" "npm run typecheck-cf" "npm run typecheck-tools"
scripts.//: the output from typecheck can be hard to read, so we run them serially to make it easier
scripts.typecheck-serial: npm run typecheck-rai && npm run typecheck-server && npm run typecheck-cf && npm run typecheck-tools
scripts.typecheck-cf: npm run typecheck-cf-prod && npm run typecheck-cf-test
scripts.typecheck-server: npm run typecheck-server-prod && npm run typecheck-server-test
scripts.typecheck-rai: npm run typecheck-rai-prod && npm run typecheck-rai-test
